messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Grim Summer Workspace Ten, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Grim Summer Workspace Ten have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.
